_metadata.description: Example trading configuration with safe default parameters
_metadata.usage: Copy this to 'config/trading_config.json' and customize as needed

_documentation.risk_management: Controls how much capital is risked per trade and overall
_documentation.position_sizing: Determines trade sizes based on account equity and risk tolerance
_documentation.stop_loss: Automatic exit to limit losses on unfavorable trades
_documentation.take_profit: Automatic exit to lock in gains on favorable trades
_documentation.trading_mode: Controls whether bot runs in paper/live mode with safety gates

risk_management._comment_base_account_size: Starting account size in USD for backtests
risk_management._comment_default_risk_per_trade: Fraction of account to risk per trade (0.01 = 1%). Lower = more conservative
risk_management._comment_max_exposure: Maximum total exposure as fraction of account (0.15 = 15%). Prevents over-leverage
risk_management._comment_default_slippage: Expected slippage in decimal form (0.001 = 0.1%). Market orders experience slippage
risk_management._comment_min_position_size_usd: Minimum position size in USD to prevent dust trades

stop_loss._comment_default_sl_atr_mult: Stop-loss distance in ATR units. Higher = wider stops, lower win rate but better winners
stop_loss._comment_enable_trailing_stop: Enable percentage-based trailing stop to lock in profits
stop_loss._comment_trailing_stop_pct: Trailing stop distance as decimal (0.02 = 2% trail from highest price)

take_profit._comment_default_tp_atr_mult: Take-profit distance in ATR units. Should be > sl_atr_mult for positive risk/reward

trading_mode._comment_allow_live_trading: Safety gate. Must be true AND mode='live' to enable real trading
trading_mode._comment_max_daily_loss_pct: Halt trading if daily loss exceeds this percentage (0.02 = 2%)
trading_mode._comment_max_risk_per_trade_pct: Hard limit on risk per trade (0.01 = 1%)
trading_mode._comment_max_open_trades: Maximum number of concurrent open positions
trading_mode._comment_max_exposure_pct: Maximum total exposure as percentage of equity (0.15 = 15%)

strategy._comment_default_strategy: Name of the default strategy to use
strategy._comment_symbols: List of trading pairs to monitor

execution._comment_order_type: Default order type: 'market' (immediate) or 'limit' (wait for price)
execution._comment_max_consecutive_failures: Halt trading after this many consecutive order failures

safety._comment_require_live_confirmation: Require manual confirmation before entering live mode
safety._comment_log_all_decisions: Log all trading decisions including rejected trades
safety._comment_kill_switch_env_var: Environment variable name for emergency stop. Set to '1' to halt all trading

_safety_checklist: ✓ Risk per trade set to conservative 1%
✓ Maximum exposure limited to 15% of account
✓ Stop-loss required on all trades (1.5 ATR minimum)
✓ Live trading disabled by default (paper mode)
✓ Trailing stops enabled to protect profits
✓ Minimum position size enforces quality over quantity
⚠ Always test in paper mode before enabling live trading
⚠ Never commit API keys or secrets to version control
⚠ Review all parameters before deploying to production
